title: Tony Heurtebis
text:
Tony Heurtebis (born 15 January 1975) is a French <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="goalkeeper%20%28association%20football%29">goalkeeper</a> who played for <a href="Stade%20Rennais%20FC">Stade Rennais</a>, <a href="Troyes%20AC">Troyes AC</a>, <a href="Stade%20Brestois">Stade Brestois</a> and <a href="FC%20Nantes%20Atlantique">FC Nantes Atlantique</a>. He has been capped for the <a href="France%20national%20under-21%20football%20team">France under-21 squad</a>.
Honours.
Troyes AC
